thread.title: Aprylle Gilbert ran across America for San Jose Kids
thread.title_full: Aprylle Gilbert ran across America for San Jose Kids

title: Aprylle Gilbert ran across America for San Jose Kids
text:
Aprylle Gilbert ran across America for San Jose Kids Where 
6:00 p.m. Monday, Oct. 19, 2015 Categories 
Events, Fundraisers, Sports San Jose area endurance runner Aprylle Gilbert had a dream of crossing the entire country to raise money for disadvantaged youth .. who would believe she could do this ? .. armed with supplement and nutrition advice she set out on May 11th from SoCal and ran for 4 months and 4 days, finishing September 15th .. and we're getting ready to welcome our hero home wink emoticon As you can see, after completing her 3,600 mile run along US Route 6, Aprylle had to step into the cool Atlantic Ocean and while there in Provincetown, MA. she received her Presidential “Points of Light” award from the White House .. and we'll be celebrating her momentous achievement at the Glass House in San Jose, October 19th, "Aprylle ran across America for San Jose Kids" .. join us to meet Aprylle in person and hear her amazing story .. the Glass House is at 2 S. Market St, and we'll watch Monday Night Football starting at 5:30, listen to Aprylle speak at half-time, and dance to our DJ afterwards.
